name: Kabuto

abilities.name: Kabuto Armor
abilities.text: Whenever an attack (even your own) does damage to Kabuto (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack only does half the damage to Kabuto (rounded down to the nearest 10). (Any other effects of attacks still happen.) This power stops working while Kabuto is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

flavorText: A Pok√©mon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

strengths: Kabuto Armor halves all damage taken
Effective HP is much higher than 30
weaknesses: Evolves from Mysterious Fossil, not a Basic
counters: High damage still hurts through halving

competitiveHistory: Kabuto's Kabuto Armor was innovative, effectively doubling its survivability. However, even with damage halving, 30 HP was extremely fragile. The requirement to evolve from Mysterious Fossil made the line slow to set up, and Kabutops wasn't strong enough to justify the effort.

rulings.ruling: Kabuto Armor halves damage after applying Weakness and Resistance.
Damage is rounded down to the nearest 10. So 30 damage becomes 10 (15 rounds to 10).
Kabuto Armor applies to your own attacks as well as opponent's attacks.
If Kabuto is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed, Kabuto Armor does not work and full damage is taken.
